Player History
Drafted in 1st round, 12th overall pick, by Oakland in 1969...
Injured on 8/26/1969 with a Sprained Ankle, out for 6 days...
Injured on 4/3/1970 with a Bruised Ankle, out for 4 days...
Had first career hit on 7/15/1973, off Gene Garber (TEX)...
Hit first career homerun on 8/18/1973, off Masanori Murakami (CLE)...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Texas on 5/30/1978...
Was selected to the 1978 Allstar game...
Signed as a free agent by Cleveland on 2/21/1979 to a 3-year deal worth $2,480,000 per year...
Drove in 6 runs against Oakland on 8/2/1980...
Won Player of the Week award on 8/4/1980, hitting .423 with 4 HR, 10 RBI...
Traded from Cleveland to New York (N) on 1/31/1981 (Going to NYM: C K. Tabuchi. Going to CLE: RF R. Lisi)...
Was selected to the 1981 Allstar game...
